snippet: From a state-of-the-art recycling center in Brooklyn to sustainable rebuilding efforts for places hit by Hurricane Sandy, a host of green projects are on the horizon.
abstract: Many green architectural projects, ranging from a state-of-the-art recycling center in Brooklyn to sustainable rebuilding efforts for places hit by Hurricane Sandy, are emerging in fall 2013.
lead_paragraph: From a state-of-the-art recycling center in Brooklyn to sustainable rebuilding efforts for places hit by Hurricane Sandy, a host of green projects are on the horizon.

headline.seo: A Crop of Projects With Green Bonafides
headline.main: Architecture in Tune With the Climate
headline.print_headline: Architecture in Tune With the Climate

keywords.value: Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design (LEED)
keywords.name: subject
